languages.text: Россыпь странных обломков покрывает поверхность стола. Все это — ломаные черепки, скрижали на табличках, причудливой ковки лезвия и многое другое — явно созданы примитивными средствами.

traits.locale_text: [Драфт] На столе лежит куча небольших примитивных объектов.

languages.text: Strange debris is scattered across the table's surface. All of it — the broken pieces of pottery, the inscribed tablets, the blades with fanciful designs — is clearly the work of primitive craftspeople.
languages.original_text: Россыпь странных обломков покрывает поверхность стола. Все это — ломаные черепки, скрижали на табличках, причудливой ковки лезвия и многое другое — явно созданы примитивными средствами.

traits.locale_text: Strange debris is scattered across the table's surface. All of it — the broken pieces of pottery, the inscribed tablets, the blades with fanciful designs — is clearly the work of primitive craftspeople.

Strange debris is scattered across the table's surface. All of it — the broken pieces of pottery, the inscribed tablets, the blades with fanciful designs — is clearly the work of primitive craftspeople.

Strange debris is scattered across the table's surface. All of it — the broken pieces of pottery, the inscribed tablets, the blades with fanciful designs — is clearly the work of primitive craftspeople.

Strange debris is scattered across the table's surface. All of it — the broken pieces of pottery, the inscribed tablets, the blades with fanciful designs — is clearly the work of primitive craftspeople.

languages.text: 桌子上散落着各种各样的古怪碎片，包括破碎的陶器碎片、刻有文字的石板，以及带有奇特图案的刀刃。很显然，这些东西都是由原始文明的工匠打造出来的。
languages.original_text: Strange debris is scattered across the table's surface. All of it — the broken pieces of pottery, the inscribed tablets, the blades with fanciful designs — is clearly the work of primitive craftspeople.

traits.locale_text: 桌子上散落着各种各样的古怪碎片，包括破碎的陶器碎片、刻有文字的石板，以及带有奇特图案的刀刃。很显然，这些东西都是由原始文明的工匠打造出来的。

languages.text: Hay unos fragmentos extraños a lo largo de la mesa. Todos ellos (cerámica rota, tablillas inscritas, cuchillos de diseños complejos) son claramente obra de artesanos primitivos.
languages.original_text: Strange debris is scattered across the table's surface. All of it — the broken pieces of pottery, the inscribed tablets, the blades with fanciful designs — is clearly the work of primitive craftspeople.

traits.locale_text: Hay unos fragmentos extraños a lo largo de la mesa. Todos ellos (cerámica rota, tablillas inscritas, cuchillos de diseños complejos) son claramente obra de artesanos primitivos.

languages.text: 奇妙な破片がテーブルに散らばっている。陶器の破片、刻まれた石板、空想的なデザインの刃物など、そのすべては明らかに原始的な職人の手によるものだ。
languages.original_text: Strange debris is scattered across the table's surface. All of it — the broken pieces of pottery, the inscribed tablets, the blades with fanciful designs — is clearly the work of primitive craftspeople.

traits.locale_text: 奇妙な破片がテーブルに散らばっている。陶器の破片、刻まれた石板、空想的なデザインの刃物など、そのすべては明らかに原始的な職人の手によるものだ。

languages.text: D'étranges débris recouvrent la table : des morceaux de poteries, des tablettes portant des inscriptions, des lames extravagantes... Tout ce qui se trouve ici est clairement l'œuvre d'artisans primitifs.
languages.original_text: Strange debris is scattered across the table's surface. All of it — the broken pieces of pottery, the inscribed tablets, the blades with fanciful designs — is clearly the work of primitive craftspeople.

traits.locale_text: D'étranges débris recouvrent la table : des morceaux de poteries, des tablettes portant des inscriptions, des lames extravagantes... Tout ce qui se trouve ici est clairement l'œuvre d'artisans primitifs.

languages.text: Auf der Tischplatte liegt verstreut merkwürdiger Schutt. Die zerbrochenen Töpfereien, die beschrifteten Tafeln, die reichhaltig verzierten Klingen – das alles ist eindeutig die Arbeit primitiver Handwerker.
languages.original_text: Strange debris is scattered across the table's surface. All of it — the broken pieces of pottery, the inscribed tablets, the blades with fanciful designs — is clearly the work of primitive craftspeople.

traits.locale_text: Auf der Tischplatte liegt verstreut merkwürdiger Schutt. Die zerbrochenen Töpfereien, die beschrifteten Tafeln, die reichhaltig verzierten Klingen – das alles ist eindeutig die Arbeit primitiver Handwerker.

languages.text: Masanın üzerine tuhaf döküntüler saçılmış. Kırık çömlek parçalarından yazılı tabletlere ve gösterişli tasarımlara sahip kılıçlara hepsi, ilkel zanaatkârların elinden çıkma şeylere benziyor.
languages.original_text: Strange debris is scattered across the table's surface. All of it — the broken pieces of pottery, the inscribed tablets, the blades with fanciful designs — is clearly the work of primitive craftspeople.

traits.locale_text: Masanın üstünde tuhaf döküntüler var. Kırık çömlek parçalarından yazılı tabletlere ve gösterişli tasarımlara sahip kılıçlara, hepsi de ilkel zanaatkârların elinden çıkma şeylere benziyorlar.
